feed.title: Authentik Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Authentik: Release 2023.10.7
entry.content:
See https://goauthentik.io/docs/releases/2023.10#fixed-in-2023107

What's Changed

  • sources/oauth: revert azure_ad profile URL change (cherry-pick #8139) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/8141
  • web/flows: fix icon for generic oauth source with dark theme (cherry-pick #8148) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/8151
  • sources/oauth: fix azure_ad user_id and add test and fallback (cherry-pick #8146) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/8152
  • sources/oauth: fix URLs being overwritten by OIDC urls (cherry-pick #8147) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/8156
  • rbac: fix invitations listing with restricted permissions (cherry-pick #8227) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/8229
  • stages/authenticator_validate: use friendly_name for stage selector when enrolling (cherry-pick #8255) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/8256
  • security: fix CVE-2024-23647 (cherry-pick #8345) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/8347

Full Changelog: https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/compare/version/2023.10.6...version/2023.10.7

entry.title: New release for Authentik: Release 2024.2.0
entry.content:
See https://goauthentik.io/docs/releases/2024.2

What's Changed

  • website/docs: kubernetes installation: update values (cherry-pick #8575) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/8576
  • rbac: fix permission decorator for global permissions (cherry-pick #8591) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/8597
  • web: spell customization with a Z (cherry-pick #8596) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/8602
  • web/flows: fix webauthn retry (cherry-pick #8599) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/8603

Full Changelog: https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/compare/version/2024.2.0-rc2...version/2024.2.0

entry.title: New release for Authentik: Release 2024.2.1
entry.content:
See https://goauthentik.io/docs/releases/2024.2#fixed-in-202421

What's Changed

  • stages/authenticator_validate: fix error with get_webauthn_challenge_without_user (cherry-pick #8625) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/8626
  • ci: fix missing tags from release (cherry-pick #8645) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/8647
  • events: sanitize args and kwargs saved in system tasks (cherry-pick #8644) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/8648
  • brands: fix context processor when request doesn't have a tenant (cherry-pick #8643) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/8646

Full Changelog: https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/compare/version/2024.2.0...version/2024.2.1

entry.title: New release for Authentik: Release 2024.2.2
entry.content:
See https://docs.goauthentik.io/docs/releases/2024.2#fixed-in-202422

What's Changed

  • providers/oauth2: fix inconsistent sub value when setting via mapping (cherry-pick #8677) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/8682
  • core: fix blueprint export (cherry-pick #8695) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/8696
  • enterprise: fix read_only activating when no license is installed (cherry-pick #8697) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/8698
  • website/docs: s3: fix environment variables (cherry-pick #8722) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/8726
  • enterprise: force license usage update after change to license (cherry-pick #8723) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/8725
  • root: fix container build (cherry-pick #8727) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/8728
  • ci: fix missing DOCKER_USERNAME secret (cherry-pick #8730) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/8733
  • providers/oauth2: fix offline_access requests when prompt doesn't include consent (cherry-pick #8731) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/8732
  • website/docs: s3: fix migration docs (cherry-pick #8735) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/8737
  • stages/authenticator_webauthn: fix error when enrolling new device (cherry-pick #8738) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/8740
  • ci: fix missing output on composite action (cherry-pick #8741) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/8742
  • web/admin: don't mark property mappings as required anywhere (cherry-pick #8752) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/8755
  • web/admin: don't mark remaining property mappings as required (cherry-pick #8772) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/8773
  • root: ensure consistent install_id (cherry-pick #8775) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/8776
  • website/docs: installation: kubernetes: fix values (cherry-pick #8783) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/8792
  • providers/oauth2: fix validation ordering (cherry-pick #8793) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/8795
  • flows: fix mismatched redirect behaviour for invalid and valid flows (cherry-pick #8794) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/8796

Full Changelog: https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/compare/version/2024.2.1...version/2024.2.2
